name: LooPatHerO (post LudumDare 45)
description:
"LooPatHerO" You are brave hero who must defeat the Lich and restore the stolen world!
  • Put buildings and new lands on your adventure path
  • Fill the building scale and summon the mighty Lich in last fight
  • Collect and equip loot becoming stronger

Controls:

 - Left mouse button
 - Esc - menu
 - Right button\space - pause

Thanks, FourQuarters team.
